subject: Football
College Athletics
Vandalism
lead_paragraph: The Penn State police are looking out for Joe Paterno’s Coke-bottle-thick glasses — the bronzed ones that were perched on the Paterno statue that stands outside Beaver Stadium. Vandals apparently cut the glasses off just above the base of the ears of the 7-foot sculpture between 11 a.m. Sunday and 11 a.m. Monday, when a police officer noticed the damage.
